name: Slack Channel
description: Slack bot adapter for OpenPalm. Receives messages via the Slack Events API and routes them through the gateway for processing.
author: OpenPalm
permissions: Network: outbound to gateway + Slack API
securityNotes: Requires Slack bot token and signing secret (stored in .env, never in container). Validates Slack request signatures on every webhook. All messages pass through the gateway firewall before reaching OpenCode.
